Package database

Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
database.MenuItem
public class MenuItem extends Object
Represents the MenuItem table within the database

  • Field Details

    • isDelete

      public boolean isDelete

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem(int menuItemId, String itemName, double price, int categoryID, int start_day, int start_month, int end_day, int end_month)
      Constructs a menu item object given eight parameters
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - the identification of a menu item
      itemName - a menu items name
      price - the price of a menu item
      categoryID - the category identification for which a menu item belongs
      start_day - starting day for SQL queries
      start_month - starting month for SQL queries
      end_day - ending day for SQL queries
      end_month - ending month for SQL queries

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem()
      Constructs an emtpy menu item object

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem(int menuItemId, String itemName, double price, int categoryID, String categoryName, int start_day, int start_month, int end_day, int end_month)
      Constructs a menu item object given nine parameters
      Parameters:
      menuItemId - the identification of a menu item
      itemName - a menu items name
      price - the price of a menu item
      categoryID - the category identification for which a menu item belongs to
      categoryName - category name for which a menu item belongs to
      start_day - starting day for SQL queries
      start_month - starting month for SQL queries
      end_day - ending day for SQL queries
      end_month - ending month for SQL queries
